name: Ch14BBaseConvo4
_source: speak;Gerik;And that's how we managed to complete the escort mission.|Even with those bandits ambushing us at every turn.
speak;Tethys;Chief makes it sound so simple!|I still remember how tense it was crossing that mountain pass.
speak;Marisa;The client paid well though.|Worth the trouble.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Is that mercenary talk I hear?|Mind if old Dozla joins your conversation?
speak;Gerik;Dozla!|Didn't see you there.|Of course, join us. We were just swapping old job stories.
speak;Tethys;I didn't realize you had experience as a mercenary, Dozla.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Indeed I do!|Before I pledged my axe to Lady L'Arachel, I wandered the continent taking all manner of jobs!
speak;Dozla;Everything from monster extermination to treasure hunting!|Once I even escorted a caravan through the Melkaen Coast!
speak;Gerik;The Melkaen Coast?|That's notorious monster territory.|Must have been quite the fight.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|That it was!|Fifteen revenants surrounded us on the third night!
speak;Dozla;I stood guard while the merchants cowered in their wagons!|My axe arm was sore for days afterward!
speak;Tethys;That's incredible!|How did you end up in Lady L'Arachel's service after such adventures?
speak;Dozla;Ah, now that's a tale worth telling!|I was hired to clear monsters from the Rausten royal hunting grounds.
speak;Dozla;There I met a young L'Arachel, barely sixteen, fighting monsters on her own!|Such bravery! Such determination!
speak;Dozla;When the job was done, she asked me to join her crusade against evil!|Gwa ha ha!|How could I refuse?
speak;Gerik;You know, Dozla...|The Desert Tiger mercenary troupe could always use someone with your experience.
speak;Gerik;If you ever find yourself looking for work after this war, come find us.
speak;Tethys;Oh yes!|You'd fit right in with our band of misfits.
speak;Marisa;Agreed.|Would be good to have you.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|You honor me with such an invitation!|I would love nothing more than to join your illustrious company!
speak;Dozla;But I've sworn to watch over Lady L'Arachel until these old bones give out!|A promise I intend to keep!
speak;Gerik;Loyalty like that is rare.|I respect a man who stands by his word.
speak;Tethys;Well, we can still enjoy swapping stories while we travel together.|There's much we could learn from each other.
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Indeed! Let us make the most of our time as comrades in arms!
speak;Dozla;And perhaps when Lady L'Arachel visits Jehanna.|Old Dozla can join you for an adventure or two!
speak;Gerik;As am I.|Now, you must tell us about that time you mentioned fighting a cyclops!
speak;Dozla;Gwa ha ha!|Oh, that's a good one!|Picture this: a mountain cave, three treasure hunters, and the biggest cyclops you've ever seen!
